frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-force-quit
frozen.shortDescription: Adds a force quit button which launches xkill.
frozen.longDescription:
Adds a force quit button which launches xkill.
On accidental click, right click to undo or click on the panel.
Customize position by tweaking line 47 of extension.js
